cmd.menu.title: === HyPerks Cosmetics ===
cmd.menu.gui_failed: GUI menu is unavailable right now.
cmd.menu.gui_hint: Tip: if GUI closes, use the commands below.
cmd.list.title: Cosmetics list ({0}) - {1} entries
cmd.active.title: Your active cosmetics:
cmd.status.title: HyPerks status:
join.hint: Use /hyperks menu to open the cosmetics command menu.
error.no_permission: You do not have permission for this action.
error.player_only: This command can only be used by a player.
error.world_not_allowed: Cosmetics are disabled in your current world.
error.cooldown: Please wait {0}s before using another HyPerks command.
cosmetic.auras.ember_halo.name: Ember Halo
cosmetic.auras.ember_halo.desc: Warm ember sparks orbit above your shoulders.
cosmetic.auras.void_orbit.name: Void Orbit
cosmetic.auras.void_orbit.desc: Dark orbiting particles with a calm void vibe.
cosmetic.auras.angel_wings.name: Angel Wings
cosmetic.auras.angel_wings.desc: A wing-like shimmer behind your back.
cosmetic.auras.heart_bloom.name: Heart Bloom
cosmetic.auras.heart_bloom.desc: Floating heart particles above your head.
cosmetic.auras_premium.vip_aura.name: VIP Crown Aura
cosmetic.auras_premium.vip_aura.desc: A premium golden aura ring for VIP players.
cosmetic.auras_premium.vip_plus_aura.des: Royal particles orbit in a stronger crown pattern.
cosmetic.auras_premium.mvp_aura.name: MVP Pulse Aura
cosmetic.auras_premium.mvp_aura.desc: Vertical pulse effect that radiates power.
cosmetic.auras_premium.mvp_plus_aura.des: Dense premium crown aura with extra highlights.
cosmetic.trails.vip_trail.name: VIP Comet Trail
cosmetic.trails.vip_trail.desc: Soft comet particles follow your movement.
cosmetic.trails.vip_plus_trail.name: VIP+ Spark Trail
cosmetic.trails.vip_plus_trail.desc: Bright spark trail that rises while you move.
cosmetic.trails.mvp_trail.name: MVP Spiral Trail
cosmetic.trails.mvp_trail.desc: Spiral ribbon trail with stronger contrast.
cosmetic.trails.mvp_plus_trail.name: MVP+ Supreme Trail
cosmetic.trails.mvp_plus_trail.desc: Premium dual spiral trail for top rank players.
cosmetic.footprints.flame_steps.name: Flame Steps
cosmetic.footprints.flame_steps.desc: Burning footprints appear where you run.
cosmetic.footprints.frost_steps.name: Frost Steps
cosmetic.footprints.frost_steps.desc: Cool icy footprints mark each movement.
cosmetic.footprints.heart_steps.name: Heart Steps
cosmetic.footprints.rune_steps.name: Rune Steps
cosmetic.footprints.rune_steps.desc: Arcane rune traces appear under your feet.
cosmetic.floating_badges.vip.name: VIP Tag Stream
cosmetic.floating_badges.vip.desc: Small VIP tags stream from your feet upward.
cosmetic.floating_badges.vip_plus.name: VIP+ Tag Stream
cosmetic.floating_badges.vip_plus.desc: A denser VIP+ tag stream with brighter tones.
cosmetic.floating_badges.mvp.name: MVP Tag Stream
cosmetic.floating_badges.mvp.desc: MVP tags rise quickly around your character.
cosmetic.floating_badges.mvp_plus.name: MVP+ Tag Stream
cosmetic.floating_badges.mvp_plus.desc: Top-tier MVP+ tag stream with high intensity.
cosmetic.floating_badges.mcqc_legacy_fle: A floating fleur-de-lys badge for Minecraft Quebec veterans.
Variant B: a neon cyan-magenta fleur style for MCQC veterans.
Variant C: a clean royal fleur style for MCQC veterans.
Champion crown effect for season winners.
cosmetic.trophy_badges.ranked_top10.name: Ranked Top 10
cosmetic.trophy_badges.ranked_top10.desc: Prestige crown for ranked top 10 players.
cosmetic.trophy_badges.event_winner.name: Event Winner
cosmetic.trophy_badges.event_winner.desc: Celebration crown reserved for event winners.
cosmetic.trophy_badges.beta_veteran.name: Beta Veteran
cosmetic.trophy_badges.beta_veteran.desc: Legacy crown for early beta veterans.
cosmetic.trophy_badges.mcqc_legacy_troph: Honor trophy for your old Minecraft Quebec players.
Variant B: elegant neon-fantasy trophy for MCQC veterans.
Variant C: clean prestige trophy for MCQC veterans.
